common_0088_head_teacher_01:
[BD06:0][pknm:1] seems to have taken quite
a\r
liking\r
to\r
you,\r
M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0].[npcn:A]
common_0088_head_teacher_02:
This is your first Pokémon, yes? Please raise it
with love and care.[npcn:A]
common_0088_head_teacher_06:
And of course, be sure to keep it tucked safely
inside a Poké Ball.[npcn:A]
common_0088_rival_01:
[BD06:0][trnm:0]... I can’t believe you
actually\r
chose [pknm:1]...[npcn:4]
common_0088_rival_02:
I mean, like, way to make the perfect choice
for you! You two make such a good combo![npcn:4]
common_0088_rival_05:
Can I choose one of these Pokémon too,
Director Clavell?[npcn:4]
common_0088_head_teacher_07:
Oh, but...did you not receive a Pokémon when
you entered the academy, Miss Nemona?[npcn:A]
common_0088_rival_06:
Not back then, no! I had other Pokémon I was
focused on raising at the time.[npcn:4]
common_0088_rival_07:
[BD06:0]But now I want to raise a new Pokémon alongside
[trnm:0] while [s:g]he raises h[is;er:g]\r
own\r
new partner![npcn:4]
common_0088_head_teacher_09:
[BD06:0]If you wish to raise one of these Pokémon on
equal footing with M[aster;iss:g]\r
[trnm:0]\r
here,\r
I shall\r
be\r
more\r
than\r
happy\r
to\r
allow it.[npcn:A]
common_0088_rival_09:
[BD06:0]Since [trnm:0] chose
[pknm:1],\r
I’ll\r
go\r
for\r
this\r
little one![npcn:4]
common_0088_rival_10:
[BD06:0]Nice to meet you, [pknm:2]! Welcome to
the team![npcn:4]
common_0088_rival_03:
Now that we’ve chosen our Pokémon, we HAVE
to battle![npcn:4]
common_0088_rival_04:
I’ll be waiting for you down at the beach.
Come join me when you’re ready![npcn:4]
common_0088_head_teacher_03:
As you may have noticed, Miss Nemona is a tad
overly fond of Pokémon battling.[npcn:A]
common_0088_head_teacher_04:
But I do hope you’ll join her for a battle. It will
help you get to know your own Pokémon as well.[npcn:A]
common_0088_head_teacher_05:
Miss Nemona was hoping you would join her at
the beach, wasn’t she? She’d be ever so happy\r
if you agreed to a battle with her.[npcn:A]
